original_text:
and has raised up a horn of salvation for us
    in the house of his servant David,
korean_text: 우리를 위하여 구원의 뿔을 그 종 다윗의 집에 일으키셨으니

sentences.original_text: and has raised up a horn of salvation for us
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리를 위한 구원의 뿔을 일으키셨습니다

sentences.original_text: in the house of his servant David
